The hostname or address of the MongoDB s: The hostname or address of the MongoDB server (e.g., localhost:27017 or cluster.example.mongodb.net)
Enable this if connecting to MongoDB Atl: Enable this if connecting to MongoDB Atlas (uses mongodb+srv:// protocol)
The MongoDB database to connect to (can: The MongoDB database to connect to (can be specified per action if left empty)
The username to use for connecting to th: The username to use for connecting to the MongoDB server
The password to use to identify at the M: The password to use to identify at the MongoDB server
The database to authenticate against (de: The database to authenticate against (default: admin)
Insert one or more documents into a coll: Insert one or more documents into a collection
Update multiple documents in a collectio: Update multiple documents in a collection
Find documents and update them, returnin: Find documents and update them, returning the updated documents
Replace documents that match a filter wi: Replace documents that match a filter with a new document
Perform aggregation operations on docume: Perform aggregation operations on documents in a collection
The MongoDB database to connect to (from: The MongoDB database to connect to (from your authentication)
Maximum number of documents to return: Maximum number of documents to return
Document(s) to insert. Can be a single d: Document(s) to insert. Can be a single document object or an array of documents.
MongoDB query to select documents to upd: MongoDB query to select documents to update (e.g., {"status": "pending"})
Insert a document if no documents match: Insert a document if no documents match the filter
MongoDB query to select documents to del: MongoDB query to select documents to delete (e.g., {"status": "archived"})
Return the documents after updates are a: Return the documents after updates are applied
MongoDB query to select documents to rep: MongoDB query to select documents to replace (e.g., {"_id": "123"})
New document that will replace the match: New document that will replace the matched documents
Insert the document if no documents matc: Insert the document if no documents match the filter
Which version of the document to return: Which version of the document to return
